["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"安装脚本","children":"安装脚本"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"LLVM 版本","items":[["最新",{"version":""}],["21",{"version":"-21"}],["20",{"version":"-20"}]]}],"code":"# 下载脚本
wget {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/llvm.sh
chmod +x llvm.sh
{{sudo}}./llvm.sh {{version}} all -m {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"手动启用","children":"手动启用"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["首先信任来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://apt.llvm.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://apt.llvm.org/"}]," 的 PGP 公钥："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm-snapshot.gpg.key | {{sudo}}gpg -o /etc/apt/keyrings/llvm-snapshot.gpg --dearmor","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新增 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm-apt.list"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm-apt.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 13",{"release_name":"trixie"}],["Debian 12",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 24.04 LTS",{"release_name":"noble"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"release_name":"jammy"}]]},{"title":"LLVM 版本","items":[["最新",{"version":""}],["21",{"version":"-21"}],["20",{"version":"-20"}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/llvm-snapshot.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{release_name}}/ llvm-toolchain-{{release_name}}{{version}} main
{{enable_source}}deb-src [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/llvm-snapshot.gpg] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/{{release_name}}/ llvm-toolchain-{{release_name}}{{version}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}]]}]

meta.title: LLVM APT 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
